content: It seems there is a new "feature" related to comms. The status bar on far left has an indicator of stream activity by cycling through ''\/-. Now when there is no incoming stream of data (all connections are disabled) the indicator continues to show stream activity. I think it will cause confusion and likely makes this indicator useless as it always cycles through its states regardless of whether there is stream data or not.

Dan...
"It seems there is a new "feature" related to comms. "
That's a bug. Ticker should be active only when OCPN core is getting usable positioning messages.
Thanks for the catch.
@Dave Register ^ (Moved from Dan's UI Topics)
A message was moved here from #comms > UI topics by Alec Leamas.

Sorry for the mess, finally got it right (I think).
